headline.main: Napoli Need to Avoid Distractions Against Real
headline.print_headline: Napoli Need to Avoid Distractions Against Real

lead_paragraph: Napoli will need to stay focussed and avoid distractions if they are to have any chance of clawing back their two-goal deficit against Real Madrid in the Champions League round of 16, second leg on Tuesday.
snippet: Napoli will need to stay focussed and avoid distractions if they are to have any chance of clawing back their two-goal deficit against Real Madrid in the Champions League round of 16, second leg on Tuesday....
